item.title: Glowing Panda v2.0 🐼
item.description:
New Features 🐼

• Rewritten layout 📈 for improved performance • Polished managers for playback 💻 to ensure a smooth experience • Calendar 📆 with fancy blur background behind music activity • More customization options 🎨 to personalize your glow • New and improved settings that actually save changes 🔄 • Resource management optimizations ⚙️ for a faster app
